item.title: A Leela Chess Zero Fan's TCEC Twitch Chat Emotes and Commands Guide
item.description: !chat Nightbot: "Welcome to the TCEC chatroom, where we discuss everything but chess." The Top Engine Chess Championship experience cannot be complete without the chat. The chat is hosted via Twitch and so it inherits the features of Twitch chats including some global emotes and the more than occassional toxicity, even among supposedly more educated and mostly STEM leaning chattersâ€“who are perhaps mostly computer and engineering geeks and math nerds I surmise.
